column1: Temporary Works and Construction Method Engineering MSc
column5: Key informationTemporary works are an important aspect of most construction projects and this online programme, with options to participate in some in-person activities such as site visits and a field course, will help develop your skills as a practical engineer. Building on your undergraduate and practical experience, your MSc will make you highly employable across varied disciplines in the worldwide sector.Course overviewThis MSc degree is aimed at graduates with at least two years of practical experience in construction; however, more recent graduates with a good appreciation of construction processes will also benefit.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
